name: Socialize
description:
A game about introvert cube that wants to socialize.

Use AD keys to move, W to jump, Left Click to shoot.  Make 50 friends to win the game!

This game uses Tarodev's 2D Controller so a huge shout-out to him! One of the best game-dev youtubers out there. :)

Team project, made for a 12-hour game jam. December, 2022.

IMPORTANT: The game's resolution is broken on smaller screens. If that is the case for you, play this game on the following LINK.
